name: discontinued MYANIMELIST | Tiles For Favorites 2
description: **Recent MAL profile changes has broken this script** IMPORTANT!: this theme requires a userscript! Download it here: https://greasyfork.org/en/scripts/13183 Tiles for Favourites 2, turns the favourites on your profile into a tile-layout and places them into the left-side panel! This was made after made requests here, for a better layout for the current favourites system on MAL.
